title: T206 MURR'Y ERROR 1st Sweet Cap found
author: danmckee

posts.post_title: T206 MURR'Y ERROR 1st Sweet Cap found
posts.post_content: Resides in a SGC 2 holder and was the very 1st discovery of this insanely rare error with a sweet cap back.  Purchased last year and new to the hobby.  The Piedmont one sold for $12K I believe so that is what I am asking as well. Thanks.
